hero.title: Smarter project management for your craft business
hero.description: Bring projects, files, team and AI assistance together in one place. ArbetsYtan is built for electricians, plumbers, painters, builders and all other craftspeople.
hero.trial: 14-day free trial — no credit card required

features.title: Everything you need to run your business
features.description: ArbetsYtan brings together the tools that make your workday easier.

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: Kanban board with drag and drop. Keep track of all tasks, deadlines and statuses across your projects.

fileManagement.title: File Management
fileManagement.description: Upload blueprints, documents and images. Everything organized and collected per project.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Read blueprints, summarize documents, write quotes and get help with most things — right in the app.

teamCollaboration.title: Team Collaboration
teamCollaboration.description: Invite your team, assign tasks and follow up on work. Each role sees what is relevant.

timeTracking.title: Time Tracking
timeTracking.description: Track time per task and project. Export as PDF or Excel for easy invoicing.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Automatic reminders for inactivity and real-time updates so nothing falls through the cracks.

howItWorks.title: Get started in three steps
howItWorks.description: It only takes a few minutes to get going.

step1.title: Sign up
step1.description: Create your account for free. No credit card required.

step2.title: Create your first project
step2.description: Add project details, tasks and upload relevant files.

step3.title: Invite your team
step3.description: Send invitations to your colleagues and start collaborating right away.

pricing.title: Simple and transparent pricing
pricing.description: Start for free and upgrade when you need to.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large organizations with special needs.
